description: **Tool Overview**: Microsoft’s AI tools designed for network monitoring enable organizations to leverage artificial intelligence for proactive insights and real-time alerting on network performance and anomalies. These tools can analyze vast amounts of data from various sources to identify potential security threats and inefficiencies in the network infrastructure. **Functionality**: They continuously monitor network traffic, use machine learning algorithms to detect unusual patterns, and provide administrators with actionable insights and alerts. These tools also facilitate reporting capabilities that help in long-term network performance assessment. Administrators can easily integrate these tools into their existing network management systems to enhance visibility and control.
